title: Workshop on Developing Learning Design Engines Based on IMS LD

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level instructional design theories and basic programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Course strengthening learning design engine development capabilities for medical/legal/technical experts through team-based projects. Provides practice-oriented education with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply Petri Net techniques for learning flow modeling based on IMS LD specifications
Learners can construct flexible learning design engines by referencing the OPENET4LD architecture
Learners can define interaction rules for learning flow components through ontology-based semantic design
Learners can implement Units of Learning (learning scenarios) compliant with IMS LD Level A/B standards
Learners can verify the structural validity of learning design engines through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
